title: todo.md
summary: The document discusses the potential of edge computing in the development ecosystem and the ergo-play-boilerplate project, which provides a starting point for newcomers to get into Ergo development. It includes a link to a video on the completeness of Ergo, presented by Kushti at the Ergoversary Summit 2023.

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the ergo-play-boilerplate project?
qa_pairs.answer: The ergo-play-boilerplate project provides a barebone code for newcomers to jump into the world of ergo development and get their feet wet quickly.

qa_pairs.question: What is the role of edge in the Ergo development ecosystem?
qa_pairs.answer: Edge can play a big part in the development ecosystem if it's being utilized, maintained and improved over time.

qa_pairs.question: What is the Completeness of Ergo topic discussed in the Ergoversary Summit 2023 video?
qa_pairs.answer: The Completeness of Ergo topic is discussed in the Ergoversary Summit 2023 video by Kushti.

qa_pairs.question: What are the two GitHub projects mentioned in the document?
qa_pairs.answer: The two GitHub projects mentioned are Edge (https://github.com/Ergo-Lend/edge) and ergo-play-boilerplate (https://github.com/kii-dot/ergo-play-boilerplate).

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the Completeness of Ergo video?
qa_pairs.answer: The purpose of the Completeness of Ergo video is to discuss the completeness of the Ergo platform.

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.content:
I think that edge can play a big part in the development ecosystem if it’s being utilized, maintained and improved over time. And ergo-play-boilerplate can give newcomers barebone code to jump into the world of ergo development and get their feet wet super quickly. 

 Edge - https://github.com/Ergo-Lend/edge
Ergo-play-boilerplate - https://github.com/kii-dot/ergo-play-boilerplate 


- [Completeness of Ergo | Kushti | Ergoversary Summit 2023](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=49UmOkx6pj0&list=PL8-KVrs6vXLRxmOmprVdXkHDcO4IaQZOY&index=2)
